Pre-Game Insights: Phoenix is looking to keep its six-game win streak intact when the Suns take on Dallas.
The Mavericks averaged 117.9 points per game while shooting 48.1% from the field and 36.9% from 3-point range last season.
The Suns averaged 27.0 assists per game on 42.5 made field goals last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas went 50-32 overall and 31-21 in Western Conference play last season.
Phoenix went 49-33 overall and 29-23 in Western Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
Others: Mavericks: Dante Exum: out (wrist), Dereck Lively II: day to day (shoulder), P.J. Washington Jr.: out (knee), Maxi Kleber: out (hamstring).
Suns: Bradley Beal: day to day (elbow)
